channel.title: How i make a command require's 0-2 items?
channel.description:
I got a command called ::pk
How i make it so when you type ::pk that you need 3+ items? and not 0-2 items against 0 itemers
Plz tell me

item.title: How i make a command require's 0-2 items?
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

[quote=“AD LVL 7, post:4, topic:143797”]make it like:

if (freeSlots() >= 27){ sendMessage("afraid of loosing stoeff?"); } else if (freeSlots() <= 26){ Teleport thingy goes here }

in the command[/quote]

Thanks man!

Edit: Thats when u got 3 items in Inv how i make it so they need to equip it to use the command

Read full topic
item.source: How i make a command require's 0-2 items?

item.title: How i make a command require's 0-2 items?
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

[quote=“AD LVL 7, post:2, topic:143797”]freeSlots() >= 27
^^ use this for persons that wanna 0-2 item

freeSlots() <= 26
^^ use this for persons that wanna 3 item[/quote]
So i add freeSlots() <=26 at my command ?
